TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObjectPoolingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ObjectPoolingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ObjectPoolingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 啟用並設定元件的物件共用。

span.span: Enables and configures object pooling for a component.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定物件集區時，它必須不停用 COM + 目錄;如果啟用 COM + 目錄中，它必須指定元件上。If object pooling is specified, it must not be disabled in the COM+ catalog; if enabled in the COM+ catalog, it must be specified on the component. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this attribute. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CreationTimeout { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在擲回例外狀況 (Exception) 之前等候物件在集區中成為可供使用的時間長度。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time to wait for an object to become available in the pool before throwing an exception.

summary.span: 這個值是以毫秒為單位。

span.span: This value is in milliseconds.

value.span: 以毫秒為單位的等候逾時值。

span.span: The time-out value in milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定了用戶端會等候，以毫秒為單位，傳回從集區物件。Specifies how long a client will wait, in milliseconds, for an object to be returned from the pool. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使是公用的方法方法只要從.NET Framework 基礎結構內使用。Even though it is a public method, the method is intended only to be used from within the .NET Framework infrastructure. 就開發人員將套用足夠類別屬性，並在其介面中設定其他成員。It is sufficient for a developer to apply the class attribute and set other members in its interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxPoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定集區大小最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value for the maximum size of the pool.

value.span: 集區中物件的最大數目。

span.span: The maximum number of objects in the pool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示要建立集區管理員、 主動使用用戶端和非使用中集區中管理的集區物件的數目上限。 represents the maximum number of pooled objects that the pooling manager will create, both actively used by clients and inactive in the pool. 建立物件時，集區管理員會檢查確認尚未達到最大集區大小，而且，如果不是，集區管理員會建立新物件以分配給用戶端。When creating objects, the pooling manager checks to verify that the maximum pool size has not been reached and, if it has not, the pooling manager creates a new object to dispense to the client. 如果已達到最大集區大小，用戶端要求會排入佇列，並接收它們出現的順序中的集區中的第一個可用的物件。If the maximum pool size has been reached, client requests are queued and receive the first available object from the pool in the order in which they arrived. 建立物件的要求指定的時間後逾時。Object creation requests time-out after a specified period. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/CPP/inspector.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/CS/inspector.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/VB/inspector.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinPoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定集區大小最小值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value for the minimum size of the pool.

value.span: 集區中物件的最小數目。

span.span: The minimum number of objects in the pool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表應用程式啟動時所建立的物件數目與物件在執行應用程式集區中保留的最小數目。 represents the number of objects that are created when the application starts and the minimum number of objects that are maintained in the pool while the application is running. 如果集區中可用的物件數目低於指定的最小值，以符合任何未處理的物件的要求重新填滿的集區建立新的物件。If the number of available objects in the pool drops below the specified minimum, new objects are created to meet any outstanding object requests and refill the pool. 如果集區中可用的物件數目大於最小數目，這些多餘的物件被終結時清除循環。If the number of available objects in the pool is greater than the minimum number, those surplus objects are destroyed during a clean-up cycle. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/CPP/inspector.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/CS/inspector.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/VB/inspector.vb#1)]
